resources.string: I have been developing mobile apps for iOS and Android since 2012. For the past three years I have worked as a mobile engineer for BigCommerce, and am current serving as the lead engineer on the mobile team there.

This app was developed by Chris Ruddell from scratch using Android Studio. It incorporates elements from Material Design, Jetpack Compose and Android Architecture Components. Data is loaded at runtime and updated dynamically from an AWS server instance using Ktor.

Icons in this app were made by Freepik and obtained from www.flaticon.com

Licenses used by third-party libraries in this app:

Apache 2.0
